| HistoryText             = The Smiths were a group of builder robots developed by [[Stark Unlimited (Earth-616)|Stark Unlimited]]'s R&D division. Due to the company suffering a shortage in the department of robotics, they had to make-do, and the Smiths are partially run on the compatibility algorithm from a dating app.

Based on little guidance from [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Tony Stark]], the Smiths built the [[Hulkbot 3000 (Earth-616)|Hulkbot 3000]] with the purpose to test out a behavior-modifying prototype device. Before testing out the device, the Hulkbot malfunctioned and went on a rampage, destroying one of the Smiths before being shut down by Stark. The Smiths were later deployed to defend the [[Stark Unlimited HQ]] from the [[Asgardian Dragons|dragon]] [[Sadurang (Earth-616)|Sadurang]],{{r|Tony Stark: Iron Man Vol 1 12}} and subsequently repaired the [[Manticore (Vehicle)|Manticore]].{{r|Tony Stark: Iron Man Vol 1 13}}

| Trivia                  = * [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Tony Stark]] named the Smiths after the rock band from the '80s of the [[wikipedia:The Smiths|same name]].{{r|Tony Stark: Iron Man Vol 1 12}}
* Due to the Smith's systems making use of a dating app algorithm to function, the robots thought Stark and [[James Rhodes (Earth-616)|Jim Rhodes]] were a couple.{{r|Tony Stark: Iron Man Vol 1 12}}
